name: Terebinthina
Relationship: Compare: ALUMEN; SECALE; CANTH.; NIT-AC. TEREBENE 1x; (chronic bronchitis and winter coughs; subacute stages of inflammation of respiratory tract. Loosens secretion, relieves tightened feeling, makes expectoration easy). NEUROTIC COUGHS. Huskiness of public speakers, and singers. Cystitis when urine is alkaline and offensive.)ONONIS SPINOSA - Rest Harrow - (Diuretic, Lithontriptic. Chronic nephritis; diuretic effects like JUNIPER; calculus nosebleed, worse washing face).Antidote: PHOS.

Eyes: Intense pain in eye and side of head
Fever: Heat, with violent thirst, dry tongue, profuse cold, clammy sweat
Typhoid with tympanites, hemorrhages, stupor, delirium
Stomach: Nausea and vomiting; heat in epigastric region
Head: Dull pain like from a band around the head
Vertigo, with vanishing of vision
Disturbed sense of equilibrium
Tired and difficult concentration of thoughts
Cold in head with sore nostrils with disposition to bleed
Back: BURNING PAIN IN REGION OF KIDNEYS
Drawing in right kidney extending to hip
Abdomen: Diarrhoea; stools watery, greenish, fetid, bloody
Pain before flatus with and relief after stool
Enterocolitis, with hemorrhage and ulceration of bowels
Inflamed kidneys following any acute disease
Respiratory: Difficult breathing; lungs feel distended; hemoptysis
Mouth: Tongue DRY, RED, SORE, SHINING; burning in tips, with prominent papillae
Skin: Erythema; itching pustular, vesicular eruption; urticaria
Chilblains; with excessive itching and pulsative pains
Ears: Own voice sounds unnatural; humming as of a seashell, talking loudly is painful

details: Has a selective affinity for BLEEDING MUCOUS SURFACES. Tympanites and urinary symptoms very marked. Inflammation of kidneys, with hemorrhages - dark, passive, fetid. Bright's disease preceded by dropsy (Goullon). Drowsiness and strangury. Coma. UNBROKEN CHILBLAINS.
